name: Karisma
greetingText: I know tu meri hi h pr still I want to say you something...
wishText: Doctor hota toh dil nikaal kr de deta pr kya kru engineer hu toh website bna di! You look perfect as you always do. I can't even blink my eyes while staring at you and your pics. I fall in love again and again with every glance of yours. No matter what, you will always be my lady, my queen, my life, my everything! I love you. Be mine forever!!
